content.scoreCriteria: Starting at 100, minus 25 for one Critical issue, minus 15 for one High issue, minus 10 for one Medium issue, minus 5 for one Low issue = 45.

issues.description: The database username and password are passed in cleartext via container arguments. This exposes sensitive credentials in Pod definitions and logs.
issues.recommendation: Move the database credentials into a Kubernetes Secret and reference them via environment variables or a volume mount. For example, create a Secret with the username and password and use valueFrom.secretKeyRef in env.

issues.description: The container image 'fiware/orion-ld' has no tag, which defaults to 'latest'. This can lead to unpredictable deployments and cache issues.
issues.recommendation: Pin the image to a specific, immutable version, e.g. 'fiware/orion-ld:1.0.0'.

issues.description: No securityContext is defined, so the container may run as root and retain unnecessary Linux capabilities, increasing risk if compromised.
issues.recommendation:
Define a securityContext to run as non-root and drop all capabilities. For example:
securityContext:
  runAsUser: 1000
  runAsNonRoot: true
  capabilities:
    drop:
    - ALL

issues.description: No serviceAccountName is specified, so Pods run with the default ServiceAccount, which may have broader privileges than needed.
issues.recommendation: Create and assign a dedicated ServiceAccount with minimal RBAC permissions and reference it in the Deployment with serviceAccountName.

apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: oriondb-creds
type: Opaque
stringData:
  username: "usuarioz√£o"
  password: "123456789"
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ServiceAccount
metadata:
  name: fiware-orion-sa
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: orionld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: orionld
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: fiware-orion-sa
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      containers:
      - name: orion
        image: fiware/orion-ld:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        args:
        - "-dbhost"
        - "orionld-mongodb-svc:27017"
        - "-rplSet"
        - "orionld-mongodb"
        - "-dbuser"
        - "$(DB_USER)"
        - "-dbpwd"
        - "$(DB_PASSWORD)"
        - "-dbAuthMech"
        - "SCRAM-SHA-256"
        - "-db"
        - "orion"
        - "-statCounters"
        - "-statSemWait"
        - "-statTiming"
        - "-statNotifQueue"
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1026
        env:
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: oriondb-creds
              key: username
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: oriondb-creds
              key: password
        - name: ORIONLD_MONGOCONLY
          value: "TRUE"
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "100m"
            memory: "100Mi"
          limits:
            cpu: "500m"
            memory: "500Mi"
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /version
            port: 1026
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /version
            port: 1026
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-service
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - protocol: TCP
    port: 1027
    targetPort: 1026
  selector:
    app: orionld
---
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-hpa
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: fiware-orionld
  minReplicas: 3
  maxReplicas: 15
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 30
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 70
